name: AURORA
description: This spectacular home offers a multitude of benefits for you and your family. Its special features and remarkable price will exceed your expectations. The Aurora is one of our most sophisticated models. With 4 bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms, it spans over 2,227 square feet. Prepare to fall in love with the Aurora. Its special features include an open concept floor plan, spacious living area, vaulted ceilings, ample lighting, custom cabinets, granite countertops, and energy-efficient stainless-steel appliances. The Aurora model is a stunning family home with a diverse, spacious and modern design.
